physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'CL' AND %2 IN ('FULLY PAID', 'PARTIALLY PAID') AND %3 > %4 THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %4, %3) WHEN %1 = 'CL' AND %2 IN ('FULLY PAID', 'PARTIALLY PAID') AND %3 <= %4 THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %3, %4) WHEN %1 = 'OP' AND %4 <=  CURRENT_DATE  THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %4,  CURRENT_DATE ) WHEN %1 = 'OP' AND %4 >  CURRENT_DATE  THEN  NULL  END
